entry.title: Universal - Jumbo Bathroom Tissue Roll (12 x 1000')
entry.summary:
Vendor: TORK
Type: jumbo bathroom tissue
Price: 74.44

  • Soft and absorbent, it delivers quality, value and performance
  • Made from 100% recycled fibres with no added dyes or fragrances, an environmental benefit and a positive image builder
  • Universal core is designed to fit virtually all size jumbo tissue dispensers
  • Extra long-lasting tissue means fewer changes, less maintenance and better control of paper waste
  • Rapid break-up capability is ideal for all plumbing systems
  • Designed to maximize performance and convenience, while minimizing your overall costs
  • Smaller case cubes free up about 40% more storage space vs. conventional rolls
  • Certified UL ECOLOGO(R) 175

Ply  1
Colour White
Diameter 8.8"
Core 3.7"
Dimensions 8.8" L x 3.55" W
Rolls/case 12
Length/roll 1000'

entry.title: Pro Perform™ Green Seal® T322 - Jumbo Toilet Paper - Moka (6 x 1250')
entry.summary:
Vendor: CASCADES
Type: jumbo bathroom tissue
Price: 42.50

Cascades PRO Perform™ 1250' Jumbo Toilet Paper 2 ply white has 6 rolls per case and 80 cases per pallet. With a 3.4'' sheet width and 9'' roll diameter, this jumbo toilet paper provides a winning combination of performance and quality. This hygienic toilet paper is biodegradable, safe for standard septic system and ideal for use in high-traffic restrooms.

Ply  2-Ply
Sheets/roll Un-perforated
Roll Length 1250'
Colour White
Roll Type Jumbo
Rolls/Case 6

entry.title: Pro Perform™ Green Seal® T263 - Jumbo Toilet Paper - Moka (6 x 1400')
entry.summary:
Vendor: CASCADES
Type: jumbo bathroom tissue
Price: 57.05

Cascades PRO Perform™ jumbo roll toilet paper has all your bases covered in high-traffic restrooms. Its 1400 feet of 2-ply tissue will leave you feeling clean while its 100% recycled fiber and 60% post-consumer material has earned it the Green Seal, UL and Green-e Certification. Sustainability is in our DNA, so we've even exceeded EPA Comprehensive procurement guidelines. Cover all your bases with our jumbo roll tissues that have been designed to work exclusively with Tandem jumbo roll toilet paper dispensers. This product is biodegradable and safe for plumbing and septic systems. This product meets the Green Seal™ Standard GS-1, based on chlorine-free processing, energy and water efficiency, and content of 100% recovered material with a minimum of 60% post-consumer material.

Ply  2-Ply
Sheets/roll Un-perforated
Roll Length 1400'
Colour Moka
Roll Type Jumbo
Rolls/Case 6
